Articles.api/articles/:article_id: Displays an article specified by the article ID which should be an integer (e.g. api/articles/42)
Articles.api/articles?order=asc: Displays all articles by order of date created (ascending)
Articles.api/articles?order=desc: Displays all articles by order of date created (descending)
Articles.api/articles?author=:parameter: Displays all articles by a given parameter (e.g. api/articles?author=jessjelly will display articles by the author with username jessjelly)
Articles.api/articles?sort_by=:parameter: Displays all articles sorted by the specified parameter (e.g. /api/articles?sort_by=author)

Comments.api/articles/:article_id/comments: Displays the comments on a given article (e.g. /api/articles/42/comments)
Comments.api/comments/:comment_id: Displays a comment with the specified ID (e.g. /api/comments/42

Users.api/users/:username: Displays information for the user with the specified username (e.g. api/users/jessjelly)
